Desc.entry: Chinese women's voluntary organisation that aims to raise the profile and promote the welfare of Chinese women. Provides education, social and recreational facilities and offers practical, social and personal support. Also offers a rights and information service. Organises summer outing in July/August and Christmas party in December.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Thurs 9am-4.30pm, Fri 9am-4pm (office times); Last Mon in the month (Management Committee)

category.entry: BLACK AND MINORITY ETHNIC PEOPLE - COMMUNITY ORGANISATIONS
